issues.description: The problem statement (UML and instructions) require the Lecture constructor parameters to follow the attribute order: lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors. The solution implementation uses a different parameter order (lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents). This contradicts the explicit instruction to keep the constructor parameter order from the UML and would confuse students implementing the constructor (and may cause tests that expect the specified order to fail).
issues.suggested_fix: Align the solution constructor with the UML/order given in the problem statement. Change the constructor signature to: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) and set the corresponding fields in that order. Alternatively, if a different order was intended, update the problem statement and UML to explicitly state the intended parameter order.
